logentry.msg:
[#11172] upgrade script for new access control.
[#11173] Acl can convert * legacy role data to new role data * new role data to legacy role data And also read both of them from database.
[#11175] Role Editor stores role data in * new Access Control format and read role data in both of * new Access Control format * legacy format
logentry.author: semtlnori

[#11310] Translate many lines of message in Japanese. This language file is translated and reviewed by many contributors from NHN I&S and NHN Japan.
Thanks for translation, to JIHYUN KIM, TOMIHISA FUCHIMOTO, BUWON LEE, DONGSEOB KIM, INGYU CHOI, HYUNWOO JEONG from Game Platform Team and JINSUNG YOON from Technical Writing Team!
Thanks for review, to ATSUSHI YAMAGUCHI and RYOHEI OIZAKI from Game Platform Team!
